short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Currencies with current exchange rate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple yet powerful tool to save your time while converting currencies. 

Key features include:
1. Real-time conversion
2. Uses updated exchange rates
3. Can select from 170 different currencies
4. Remembers the last selected currencies
